item.description: Image: Nintendo EPD/Nintendo Nintendo blames Yuzu for pirated copies of The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom being played early Nintendo is suing the makers of Yuzu, an open-source Nintendo Swi...
item.content:encoded: Image: Nintendo EPD/Nintendo Nintendo blames Yuzu for pirated copies of The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom being played early Nintendo is suing the makers of Yuzu, an open-source Nintendo Switch emulator, according to a lawsuit filed in Rhode Island court on Monday. Game File reporter Stephen Totilo first reported the suit. The 41-page lawsuit was filed against Tropic Haze, the company that makes Yuzu. (Nintendo also specifically references a person aliased as Bunnei, who leads developm...

item.content:encoded: Image: Square Enix We dig into the Polygon archives to try to figure out what Square Enix has planned One of the biggest fan theories swirling around Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth is that Aerith ‚Äî famous for dying in the original Final Fantasy 7 ‚Äî may escape her fate this time around. item.description: Image: LocalThunk/Playstack via Polygon The next must-play deck builder is here I‚Äôm not a poker guy, but I am definitely a Balatro guy now. Created by an anonymous developer who goes by the pen name...
item.content:encoded: Image: LocalThunk/Playstack via Polygon The next must-play deck builder is here I‚Äôm not a poker guy, but I am definitely a Balatro guy now. Created by an anonymous developer who goes by the pen name LocalThunk, Balatro is a deck-building roguelite that takes poker and makes it an infinitely replayable and utterly engaging game by adding cards that break the rules of poker in the most delightful ways ‚Äî via a whole lotta math. I didn‚Äôt think anyone could make PEMDAS fun, but Balatro proved me wr...

item.title: Helldivers 2 has its own fan-made Super Earth Broadcast | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Good morning, Super Earth One of the strengths of Helldivers 2 is the communal sense of purpose. Every time a squad successfully completes a mission on a planet, the liberation percentage increases. ...
item.content:encoded: Good morning, Super Earth One of the strengths of Helldivers 2 is the communal sense of purpose. Every time a squad successfully completes a mission on a planet, the liberation percentage increases. Although progress toward this communal goal is tracked in real time, you can only see it in-game. The Super Earth Broadcast, a TikTok account with 300,000 followers, has been providing a bridge to the outside world since Feb. 15, keeping players up to date with Galactic War news even when they‚Äôre of...

item.content:encoded: Posted by Zheng Xu, Research Scientist, and Yanxiang Zhang, Software Engineer, Google Language models (LMs) trained to predict the next word given input text are the key technology for many applications [1, 2]. In Gboard, LMs are used to improve users‚Äô typing experience by supporting features like next word prediction (NWP), Smart Compose, smart completion and suggestion, slide to type, and proofread. Deploying models on users‚Äô devices rather than enterprise servers has advantages like lower...

item.title: Prompt Engineering: An Integrated Dream | KDnuggets
item.description: Clickbait headlines like "AI's Hottest Job" have promised a career that anyone who knows how to chat with AI could pay a six-figure salary with no computer background. But is this reality, or just ano...
item.content:encoded: Clickbait headlines like "AI's Hottest Job" have promised a career that anyone who knows how to chat with AI could pay a six-figure salary with no computer background. But is this reality, or just another internet pipe dream? Let's ditch the sensationalism and delve into the actual job market data to find out.

item.title: Introduction to Memory Profiling in Python | KDnuggets

item.title: Learning the importance of training data under concept drift | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Nishant Jain, Pre-doctoral Researcher, and Pradeep Shenoy, Research Scientist, Google Research The constantly changing nature of the world around us poses a significant challenge for the...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Nishant Jain, Pre-doctoral Researcher, and Pradeep Shenoy, Research Scientist, Google Research The constantly changing nature of the world around us poses a significant challenge for the development of AI models. Often, models are trained on longitudinal data with the hope that the training data used will accurately represent inputs the model may receive in the future. More generally, the default assumption that all training data are equally relevant often breaks in practice. For e...

item.title: Semantic Layers are the Missing Piece for AI-Enabled Analytics | KDnuggets
item.description: Integrating a semantic layer with Language Learning Models (LLMs) presents a clean solution to this, particularly in the realm of AI chatbots. This combination empowers businesses to generate fast res...
item.content:encoded: Integrating a semantic layer with Language Learning Models (LLMs) presents a clean solution to this, particularly in the realm of AI chatbots. This combination empowers businesses to generate fast responses and reports based on their data. Leveraging AI and semantic layers is advancing business intelligence, making it easier than ever for people to interact with data.
